entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:48 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
